Module SoftEng_2024
Package SoftEng_2024.View.ViewStates

Class ViewState

java.lang.Object
SoftEng_2024.View.ViewStates.ViewState
Direct Known Subclasses:
ChooseGoalState, ConnectionState, DrawState, EndGameState, PlayState, ReadyToStartState, RejoinState, SetColorState, StarterState, WaitingForTurnState
public abstract class ViewState extends Object
ViewState is an abstract class representing a state in the user interface for a game client. It provides methods for displaying information, handling user commands, and updating the client interface.
